similar_incidents.title: Cluster PROD-027-OCP001  degraded
similar_incidents.resolution:
Cause: MySQL Pod was restarted.
‚ùó Ratings Service is unable to pick up the restart and has to be restarted as well. 
üöÄ Resolved by restarting the ratings pods: oc delete pod -n robot-shop $(oc get po -n robot-shop|grep ratings|awk '{print$1}'
